title: WHIRLING F1 / STEEL DOOR
description: The steel door in the back of the kitchen. Leads to the storage area with the elevator.

dialogueTree.title: Blue door: "You see a heavy steel door with a p..."
dialogueTree.text: You see a heavy steel door with a prominent dimple lock. It's painted blue.

links.title: You: "Try the 'Workshop Spare' key on the..."
links.text: Try the 'Workshop Spare' key on the door.

links.title: Blue door: "The key fits the dimple lock. It ta..."
links.text: The key fits the dimple lock. It takes a bit of effort to turn it after all these years, but then -- the lock clicks.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Dust rises before you like mist. A..."
links.text: Dust rises before you like mist. A tomb? Haunted by regal spirits from distant ages...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "No. Smells like engine grease and c..."
links.text: No. Smells like engine grease and cut wood. A workshop.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The darkness before you smells like..."
links.text: The darkness before you smells like engine grease and cut wood...

links.title: Blue door: "The key fits the dimple lock. It ta..."
links.text: The key fits the dimple lock. It takes a bit of effort to turn it after all these years, but then -- the lock clicks.

links.title: Blue door: "The key fits the dimple lock. It ta..."
links.text: The key fits the dimple lock. It takes a bit of effort to turn it after all these years, but then -- the lock clicks.

links.title: You: "Touch the door."
links.text: Touch the door.

links.title: Blue door: "The cobalt blue surface feels rough..."
links.text: The cobalt blue surface feels rough to touch. The stainless steel door is flush with its frame on every side.

links.title: Interfacing: "Old cobalt paint. Rough on the fing..."
links.text: Old cobalt paint. Rough on the fingers. Forty, fifty years since this was painted, maybe?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It leads to a side-building, adjace..."
links.text: It leads to a side-building, adjacent to this one. The old building next to this, half ruined. Whatever is behind it must be older.

links.title: You: "Try to push on the door."
links.text: Try to push on the door.

links.title: Blue door: "The door does not budge."
links.text: The door does not budge.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "A challenge!"
links.text: A challenge!

links.title: You: "Pull on the door -- hard."
links.text: Pull on the door -- hard.

links.title: Blue door: "The steel doesn't even tremble."
links.text: The steel doesn't even tremble.

links.title: You: "Put your weight into it."
links.text: Put your weight into it.

links.title: Blue door: "Now you're hanging from the handle...."
links.text: Now you're hanging from the handle. The door remains immobile.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Okay -- it was a *challenge* and yo..."
links.text: Okay -- it was a *challenge* and you failed. What now, loser?

links.title: You: "Give up."
links.text: Give up.

links.title: You: "No, it's not."
links.text: No, it's not.

links.title: Blue door: "You're right. The door looks positi..."
links.text: You're right. The door looks positively *immutable*. You could never get it open using force.

links.title: You: ""I wonder where this door leads.""
links.text: "I wonder where this door leads."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So do I." The lieutenant touches t..."
links.text: "So do I." The lieutenant touches the lock. "It's locked -- and sturdy. The paint job looks old. From *before* the cafeteria."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not getting past it without..."
links.text: "We're not getting past it without a key. We should ask the bartender..." He corrects himself. "The cafeteria manager."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You do?" The lieutenant regards yo..."
links.text: "You do?" The lieutenant regards you with patient scepticism. "It's a door in the back of the kitchen. Why do you care where it leads?"

links.title: Interfacing: "The winch, outside, in the back yar..."
links.text: The winch, outside, in the back yard. Remember? No? Your *fingers* do!

links.title: You: ""There was a winch outside, on the..."
links.text: "There was a winch outside, on the roof. Like that of a small *elevator*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm... Well, if there was a *winch..."
links.text: "Hmm... Well, if there was a *winch*, I suppose we could look into it. As a... side-investigation."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's hardly a side-investigation. Y..."
links.text: It's hardly a side-investigation. You already have a name for it.

links.title: You: ""Yes, a mini side-investigation.""
links.text: "Yes, a mini side-investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you, then at the door...."
links.text: He looks at you, then at the door. "Garte is the person to ask about this -- the cafeteria manager."

links.title: You: ""No, the door is a *mega-investigat..."
links.text: "No, the door is a *mega-investigation*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hardly." He looks at the door, the..."
links.text: "Hardly." He looks at the door, then you. "Anyway, Garte is the person to ask about this -- the cafeteria manager."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's hardly worth a *title*..." He..."
links.text: "It's hardly worth a *title*..." He looks at the door, then you. "Anyway, Garte is the person to ask about this -- the cafeteria manager."

links.title: You: ""The door and the main investigatio..."
links.text: "The door and the main investigation will merge into a *stereo*-investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you say so." He looks at the do..."
links.text: "If you say so." He looks at the door, then you. "Garte is the person to ask about this -- the cafeteria manager."

links.title: You: ""I am drawn to its cobalt blue.""
links.text: "I am drawn to its cobalt blue."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It *is* quite pretty. I suppose we..."
links.text: "It *is* quite pretty. I suppose we could look into it. As a... side-investigation."

links.title: You: ""It's part of the Whirling-in-Rags...."
links.text: "It's part of the Whirling-in-Rags. There's something *about* this place that makes me want to know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Eccentric. But okay, I suppose we..."
links.text: "Eccentric. But okay, I suppose we could look into it. As a... side-investigation."

links.title: Empathy: "He's not bothered by your eccentric..."
links.text: He's not bothered by your eccentricity. He seems genuinely intrigued himself.

links.title: You: ""Out of duty. We may find something..."
links.text: "Out of duty. We may find something pertinent to the investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm... Yes, I suppose it's worth s..."
links.text: "Hmm... Yes, I suppose it's worth seeing if we can get in. Just to be thorough. As a... side-investigation."

links.title: You: ""You're right. It's not important...."
links.text: "You're right. It's not important. Let's go."

links.title: Blue door: "The door stands silent, unmoved by..."
links.text: The door stands silent, unmoved by your words. You still feel like you should look into it if you get the chance...

links.title: Blue door: "Your words fail to even echo agains..."
links.text: Your words fail to even echo against the door's implacable steel.

links.title: You: ""This door is *connected* to the on..."
links.text: "This door is *connected* to the one upstairs. But how do we get through?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Have you tried using the key?" The..."
links.text: "Have you tried using the key?" The lieutenant nods toward the lock. "I suspect that will work."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be a key somewhere," th..."
links.text: "There must be a key somewhere," the lieutenant says. "Probably somewhere in the Whirling? It's not *too* important. We can get in and out using the roof door."

links.title: You: ""I'll be back, door. Mark my words...."
links.text: "I'll be back, door. Mark my words." [Leave.]

links.title: Blue door: "The door stands silent, unmoved by..."
links.text: The door stands silent, unmoved by your words.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It could be connected to the barred..."
links.text: It could be connected to the barred door upstairs.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You immediately feel *drawn* to the..."
links.text: You immediately feel *drawn* to the colour. Blue is for mystery.
